title: Sorry, game couldn't start
body:
Champ select just finished. I had I thought a good team and was hoping to win. then this pops up just before game should start

"sorry game oculn't start" 

or something like that. Did someone dodge? just wondering

replies.body:
it honestly sounds like the Server had dropped the game and not that someone had dodged it! If it becomes a continuous issue that you're noticing make sure to let me know. Then that means that it may be a client to connection issue! 


{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
